Title: The Brain That Wouldn't Die
Writer: Joseph Green (screenplay), Rex Carlton (original story), Joseph Green (original story)
Actors: Jason Evers, Virginia Leith, Anthony La Penna, Adele Lamont
Plot: Dr. Bill Cortner has been performing experimental surgery on human guinea pigs without authorization and against the advice of his father, also a surgeon. When Bill's fianc√©e Jan Compton is decapitated in an automobile accident, he manages to keep her brain alive. He now needs to find a new body for his bride-to-be and settles on Doris Powell, a glamor model with a facial disfigurement. Jan meanwhile doesn't want to continue her body-less existence and calls upon the creature hidden in the basement, one of Bill Cortner's unsuccessful experiments, to break loose.
